ON_SIGN_IN_WELCOME.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlOnImagesUpgradeToPro_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Welcome to Plex-Earth 2025!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the best view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'>Click here to learn more</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_SIGN_IN_WELCOME.title: Welcome to Plex-Earth 2025

ON_SWITCH_TO_LITE.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlOnImagesUpgradeToPro_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Switch to Lite</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the fully fledged PlexEarth  view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_ROOT_GOTO]/[$PROD_REF]/plugin/support'>Contact Support Team for more info</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_SWITCH_TO_LITE.title: Upgrade to Pro!

ON_TRIAL_EXPIRES_SOON.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlOnSignIn_ExpiresSoonTrial_Image]'/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Your Plex-Earth free trial expires [select:[DAYS_TO_EXPIRE_TEXT]]!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Come to Plex-Earth world - Design for the real world!<LineBreak/>Upgrade your free trial to a subscription today<LineBreak/>and change the way you design forever.</TextBlock></TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='action:gotoPricing'>See your upgrade options!</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_TRIAL_EXPIRES_SOON.title: Your free trial expires soon

ON_WIN_CLOSE_BUTTON.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='8'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri=''></Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_WIN_CLOSE_BUTTON.title: Confirm

IMAGES_LIMIT_REACHED.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>You reached the images limit</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get the best view of your project area.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_ROOT_GOTO]/[$PROD_REF]/plugin/support'>Contact Support Team for more info</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
IMAGES_LIMIT_REACHED.title: Images Limit Reached

ON_NEARMAP_NOT_ENABLED.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><Image Width='1' Source='[$string:urlNearmap_RequestAccess_Pixel]'/><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Hyperlink NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlNearmap_RequestAccess_Image]'/></Hyperlink></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.80'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><Image Width='200' HorizontalAlignment='Left' Source='[$string:urlNearmap_RequestAccess_Logo]'/><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>We've partnered with Nearmap to bring its</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>unparallel aerial imagery right into your AutoCAD designs</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White' TextWrapping='Wrap'>through Plex-Earth's awarded platform.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'>Do you want Nearmap in Plex-Earth? Let's talk!</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_NEARMAP_NOT_ENABLED.title: Let's talk about Nearmap!

ON_HEXAGON_NOT_ENABLED.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock Opacity='1'><Hyperlink NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'><Image Width='900' Source='[$string:urlHexagon_RequestAccess_Image]'/></Hyperlink></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#F0F0F0' Opacity='0.80'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><Image Width='200' HorizontalAlignment='Left' Source='[$string:urlHexagon_RequestAccess_Logo]'/><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='#101010' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get true aerial orthophotos</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#101010' TextWrapping='Wrap'>at 15 cm class resolution right into your AutoCAD designs</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='#101010' TextWrapping='Wrap'>through Plex-Earth's awarded platform.</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}'><Hyperlink Foreground='{DynamicResource ThemeModernOrange}' NavigateUri='action:gotoLearn'>Do you want Hexagon in Plex-Earth? Ask us!</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
ON_HEXAGON_NOT_ENABLED.title: Let's talk about Hexagon!
